name: ①Doze:屏幕关闭进入doze，屏幕解锁退出doze
description: thanox需启用Lelinux宽容模式才能执行adb sh，屏幕关闭10秒后关闭强制进入doze，屏幕解锁退出doze--酷安@看灰机！
condition: if(screenOff == true){ ui.showShortToast("进入打盹Doze模式")+sh.exe("sleep 10s")+sh.exe("dumpsys deviceidle enable")+sh.exe("dumpsys deviceidle force-idle") } else if(userPresent == true){ sh.exe("dumpsys deviceidle disable") + ui.showShortToast("退出打盹Doze模式") }
